episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch02:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] suddenly heard the
sound of a camera shutter as someone snapped a
photo of [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ].

Yes! I got a perfect picture of your surprised
expression, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
This “Poryphone” machine...

To someone like me who hails from Hisui, it’s a
sophisticated device from an unknown culture, but
it’s so easy to use now that I’m accustomed to it!

It’s not just a camera but also serves all sorts of
different functions! Marvelous!

To think that the passage of time could change the
world this drastically...

Taking photographs, for example, required quite a
bit of time and effort in Hisui. It wasn’t something
we could do on a whim.

I wonder why photography has progressed so
much into the present era...
(Tell him about social media.)
Eh? Social...what?

Oho, I see! So it’s humanity’s desire for
attention—to be seen by many—that’s
driven photography to progress as far as it has!
(Ask Volo what he thinks.)

Hmm, well, this is coming from my personal
perspective as a merchant...

But since photographs are a commodity that
can be bought and sold...

I would assume there was competition to develop
the best quality and most convenient ways of
making them.

It’s fascinating to think about how history came
about the way it has!

And you offer such fresh perspectives, it makes me
want to discuss history with you even more!

That’s what gave me the bright idea of inviting
you to Pasio’s ruins to get to know each other
better.

What do you say? I’d be delighted if you’d
accompany me there!

I understand that the ruins on Pasio are
reproductions...

But because they’re modeled after actual ruins,
they’re perfect for learning about history!

You know, studying history and legend serves an
important purpose.

I want to know exactly what happened in the past
that led us to this particular present...

Or more accurately, I suppose... I want to know
where I came from and where I’m headed. I want
to know my path, so to speak.

Volo speaks with a serious tone and seems to drift
off into his own world...

What will happen in the future? Do you think it
will be better than today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?

(Shake your head to say
you don’t know.)

That’s a straightforward answer! Your opinion is
clear.
(Say that it depends on us.)
Aha...

You think that the future can change based on the
individual actions of each and every one of us,
do you?

Of course, you’d have to be a deity to really know
what the future holds in store.

It’s possible that either you or I could disappear
from this world...

That’s why I’d like to take a commemorative photo
of the two of us!

And with that, we’ve created a tangible memento
of this day... That is to say, we’ve made history!

Please remember me as you’ve seen me during
our time together.
I hope you can bear witness to history yourself.

Photos are wonderful things! They allow us to
capture and isolate the best moments!

But the world is ever-changing—don’t you agree,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Or perhaps...

Do you wish for the world to continue on forever
as it is now?
